review: Dosnt reach chromecast in anyway it's slow and it's extremely limited specialy since I had chromecast first . Keep in mind everything you want is going to be from an app.In chromecast you can watch any video from your phone and an icon will pop out on the side you click and it pops onto your tv .fire stick dosnt have that .
author: Amazon Customer

review: Very happy with my fire TV stick. It is easy to travel with and use to access my Netflix or prime videos.The only bummer is that you cannot connect it easily to hotel wifi as there is no browser. Maybe this will be improved in a future update.
author: Greg Marks

review: Very impressed with the Fire TV Stick. It was an easy setup and even though there weren't a whole lot of instructions on how to use it once the setup was done, I was able to figure it out without too much difficulty. I would highly recommend it.
author: Michael E. Hittle

review: Very good overall.  The HDMI extender cable should be longer.
author: Mike

review: EZ to set-up and use.  Great!
author: Gary E Glover

review: Met every expectation. Only wish I could control it all with one universal remote.
author: Jorge V. Avila

review: Absolutely LOVE my Fire TV Stick...in fact I ended up ordering another one.  I will also be giving these as gifts this Christmas!  Great job Amazon :)
author: Karly
